question.questionText: Describe the relationship between the length of the string and the number of swings a swinger makes in 15 seconds.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The shorter the string is, the more the string swings in 15 seconds. The longer the string is, the less the string swings in 15 seconds.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The longer the swinger the less swings it makes.
How fast the swinger is and how far it has to travel to complete one rotation.
